name: Entrust
description: Entrust a person with the `trusted` role.

name: Resolve
description: Resolve an issue ticket and provide the applied solution.

name: Roll
description: Roll a dice with a given number of sides.

name: Zap
description: Abusing this command will result in a ban. If a trusted user is abusing their power, multiple people can use this command to un-entrust them and create an issue ticket.
